name: MagSafe Game
description:
This is 'MagSafe Game', a new video game from Outhouse Media.
The game, developed by Outhouse Media, sees players rush to the wall to score by scoring points and using their sharpened sticks to flip over and collect gold. Image: The game shows players how to play games; players always score points for each block they get. The game has had more than 1,000 downloads so far and it can now be played by members of the general public. It starts off in a similar fashion to the original Mobile Suit Gundam 0079 but includes a better graphics. This allows players to showcase their skills without having to simply tap the screen. Image: Players must navigate the walls and score points in the game. The game requires three or more players to play but there is also a guest mode where the game becomes easier if one person wins. Image: The game requires three or more players to play. Players must navigate the walls and score points in the game and these points can be used to buy new weapons. Image: Players can pick up items they find. Players can also pick up items they find and use it to upgrade, for example a bomb can be repurposed to detonate out of the darkness. Image: Players can upgrade weapons. Image: Players can switch weapons. The player can even switch between their character and the host character. Image: This user can switch between characters.
